name: 63 Foot Ketch Whitsunday Adventure
description: Embark on an unforgettable 2-day adventure aboard a lovingly restored 63-foot ketch, designed for both exploration and relaxation. With a maximum of 17 guests, this intimate cruise offers a unique blend of adventure and comfort, perfect for those seeking to discover the stunning Whitsundays. Enjoy the breathtaking sunsets, crystal-clear waters, and the world-famous Whitehaven Beach. Ideal for couples, families, and solo travelers looking to immerse themselves in the natural beauty of the Whitsunday Islands.
includes:
Fresh water jacuzzi on board
Meals freshly prepared on board
Linen and bath towel
Wetsuits, snorkelling gear
Marine Park fees
highlights:
Explore the stunning Whitsunday Islands
Visit the world-famous Whitehaven Beach
Snorkel and kayak around the fringing reef
Enjoy sunset snacks and beverages on deck
BBQ dinner under the stars
Guided bush walk to Hill Inlet Lookout
Freshly prepared meals on board
price_tiers: Private Double/Twin: A$549pp AUD | Share Double: A$449pp AUD | Share Single: A$449pp AUD | Triple Share: A$449pp AUD
itinerary:
**Day 1:**
Depart Coral Sea Marina and set sail towards Whitsunday Island, enjoying lunch along the way. At Tongue Bay, our guide will take you for a bush walk to Hill Inlet Lookout for some photos and then onto the world-famous Whitehaven Beach to relax and chill. Once back on board, enjoy sunset snacks and beverages on your way to our night's anchorage. Enjoy a BBQ dinner on deck and a photo slideshow of the dayâ€™s photos.
**Day 2:**
Wake up to the beauty of the islands, enjoy breakfast on deck then gear up for a snorkel to enjoy the underwater sea life. After snorkelling, hop on board for some morning tea then jump back in for another snorkel or kayak. Then it's back on board for a BBQ lunch and then set sail back to Airlie Beach.
menu:
**Day 1 Menu:**
- Tea & coffee with freshly baked biscuits
- Baked quiche served with a quinoa garden salad, fruit platter and condiments prepared by our friendly crew.
- Tea & coffee served with Lamingtons
- A selection of oven-baked snacks and dipping sauces
- Tender marinated chicken thigh fillets on the BBQ. Served with a fresh Greek garden salad, green beans, mashed potato and garlic bread.
**Day 2 Menu:**
- A fresh tropical fruit salad served with yoghurt. Warm raisin and wholemeal toast. Served with a variety of condiments, cereals and milk. Tea and coffee.
- Tea & coffee served with an assortment of biscuits
- BBQ Hamburgers and sausages with fresh coleslaw and fruit platter.
*Note: This is a sample menu and may vary depending on season and availability. Gluten-free, lactose-free or vegan diets incur a surcharge of $10 payable at check-in.*
ideal_for: Couples, families, and solo travelers seeking an intimate and adventurous exploration of the Whitsunday Islands.
important_information: ['We try to cater to everyone, however, if you have a disability which limits movement please contact us to discuss your specific requirements as there are some limitations due to the layout of the vessel.', 'Stairs are located from the deck to the sleeping quarters and the galley stairs will need to be climbed to access and depart the vessel.', 'A tender (small vessel) is used to access beaches and bays.', 'Assistance can be provided.', 'The vessel can lean whilst sailing.']
whats_extra: ['Gluten free, lactose free or vegan diets incur a surcharge of $10 payable at check in.']
